lines: phan bde legs tshogs ma lus pa
mtshan ldan bla mar rag las pas
bsam sbyor gnyis kyis legs bsten te
mchod pa gsum gyis mnyes par bya
don che rnyed dka'i rten bzang 'di
da lta nyid du 'jig pa'ang srid
ngan 'gro tsha grang bkres skom dang
glen lkugs bkol spyod sogs kyis gzir
bde 'gro skye rga na 'chi dang
'chi 'pho ltung ba sogs kyis mnar
bdag dang rigs drug 'gro ba kun
sdug bsngal mtsho las grol ba'i thabs
gzhan du res ma mchis pas
slu med bla ma dkon mchog la
dpung gnyen mchog tu 'dzin 'dod kyi
bsam pa drag pos skyabs su 'gro
mchog gsum nam mkha' gang ba yis
bdag sogs mgon skyabs dpung gnyen mdzod
bla ma rnams la skyabs su mchi
rdzogs sangs rgyas la skyabs su mchi
dam pa'i chos la skyabs su mchi
dge 'dun rnams la skyabs su mchi
bla ma mchog gsum dam pa la
gus pas phyag 'tshal skyabs su mchi
bdag dang mkha' mnyam 'gro ba'i rgyud
myur du byin gyis brlab tu gsol
de ltar gsol ba btab pa yis
skyabs yul rnams las 'od zer 'phros
bdag dang 'gro ba kun la phog
sdig ltung sgrib pa ma lus sbyangs
'gro kun bdag gi mar gyur te
drin gyis bskyangs pa sha stag yin
sdug bsngal dngos dang 'di rgyu la
spyod cing bde ba'i go skabs bral
'di rnams sdug bsngal dang bral zhing
bde ba mchog la dgod pa'i phyir
rnam 'dren stobs bcu mnga' ba yi
go 'phang dam pa myur du bsgrub
de phyir byang chub sems sbyong gi
mkha' dbyings dbus su pad zla la
bla ma sprul sku 'od dpag med
spyan ras gzigs dang mthu chen thob
sangs rgyas byang sems nyan rang dang
chos skyong srung ma'i tshogs kyis bskor
gnas gsum rdo rje gsum gyis mtshan
hUM yig 'od kyis ye shes pa
spyan drangs thim bas dbyer med gyur
grangs mang lus sprul gus phyag 'tshal
mchod rdzas nam mkha' gang ba 'bul
thog med nas bsags sdig ltung bshags
rang gzhan dge la snying nas rangs
zab rgyas chos 'khor tshad med skor
'khor ba srid du brtan par bzhugs
'dis mtshon dge ba ji snyed pa
rdzogs byang go 'phang thob phyir bsngo
bla ma mchog gsum dam pa la
rtse gcig gus pas gsol ba 'debs
bdag dang mar gyur 'gro kun gyis
byang sems 'byongs bar byin gyis rlobs
snying nas gdung shugs drag po yis
gsol ba rtse gcig legs btab pas
'khor tshogs thams cad 'od du zhu
bla ma 'od dpag med la thim
de nyid dgyes bzhin gdan dang bcas
rang gi spyi bor byon nas bzhugs
phyag 'tshal mchod cing sdig pa bshags
yi rang bskul zhing bzhugs par gsol
dge ba rang gzhan thams cad kyis
kun 'dus bla ma 'od dpag med
rtse gcig gus pas gsol ba 'debs
bdag dang mar gyur 'gro kun gyis
byang sems 'byongs par byin gyis rlobs
gnyis pa dngos gzhi la brgyad las
tshig rkang dang po bdag gis ni
mar gyur sems can thams cad la
ci 'dod dngos grub legs stsol ba'i
bsam 'phel yid bzhin nor bu las
lhag pa'i don mchog sangs rgyas kyi
go 'phang bsgrub pa'i bsam pa yis
rgyun chad med par dus rtag tu
shin tu gces par 'dzin par shog
bla ma 'od dpag med mgon gyis
rang las sems can gzhan dag rnams
gces par 'dzin pa'i blo rnal ma
bcos min skye bar byin gyis rlobs
gnyis pa bdag ni gnas gang du
gang zag mchog dman su zhig dang
'grogs nas 'gro 'am 'dug pa'i tshe
bdag nyid 'grogs yul de kun las
shin tu dman par blta bya zhing
sems can gzhan la ngo dga' sogs
bcos min bsam pa thag pa yis
gzhan nyid mchog tu 'dzin par shog
bla ma 'od dpag med mgon gyis
rang nyid yal bar 'dor ba dang
gzhan la mchog tu 'dzin pa'i blo
bcos min skye bar byin gyis rlobs
gsum pa bdag gis 'gro 'chag sogs
spyod lam bya ba'i dus kun tu
dran shes brtan pos rang rgyud la
legs par brtags te chags sdang sogs
nyon mongs mngon gyur skyes ma thag
'dis ni bdag gzhan gnyis ka yang
'di phyir ma rung byed pas na
btsan thabs gdod nas bzlog par shog
bla ma 'od dpag med mgon gyis
nyon mongs mngon gyur skyes ma thag
'bur 'joms gdong bzlog byed pa yi
gnyen po skye bar byin gyis rlobs
bzhi pa bdag gis rang bzhin gyi
bsam pa ngan dang mtshams med sogs
sdig pa spyod dang sdug bsngal ba
drag pos non sa'i sems can rnams
mthong tshe brtse yul rnyed dka' ba
rnyed pas rin chen gter mchog dang
'phrad ltar shin tu dga' ba yis
gces par 'dzin pa'i brtse bar shog
bla ma 'od dpag med mgon gyis
sems can spyi dang khyad par du
sdig sdug drag pos mnar rnams la
shin tu brtse bar byin gyis rlobs
lnga pa gang zhig la bdag gis
phan btags pa'am de min kyang
rang la phan pa byed snyam pa'i
re ba che ba 'ga' zhig gis
phyir zhing gnod pa cher byed pa'i
shin tu mi rigs byed na yang
dge bskul bshes gnyen dam pa ru
bltas te shin tu byams par shog
bla ma 'od dpag med mgon gyis
sems can spyi dang khyad par du
gnod byed rnams la byams pa'i sems
shugs drag skye bar byin gyis rlobs
drug pa bdag la gzhan gyis ni
phrag dog gis bslangs gshe ba dang
sgro skur brdeg sogs mi rigs pa'i
bya ba ci dang ci byed kyang
gyod dang bub kha rang gis blang
khe dang rgyal kha gzhan dag la
'bul la 'gyod pa med pa dang
spro sems shugs drag skye bar shog
bla ma 'od dpag med mgon gyis
gyong pham rang gis len pa dang
khe rgyal gzhan la 'bul ba'i sems
shugs drag skye bar byin gyis rlobs
bdun pa snying po mdor bsdu na
skabs su babs tshe dngos su 'am
gzhan du gtso bor bsam pa yis
lus dang longs spyod dus gsum dge
phan bde ma rnams kun la 'bul
ma yi gnod pa sdig sgrib dang
sdug bsngal kun kyang stong min la
gsang bas bdag la len par shog
bla ma 'od dpag med mgon gyis
bdag gi bde dge gtong ba dang
zhan gyi sdig sdug len pa'i sems
bcos min skye bar byin gyis rlobs
rang gi sna bug gnyis nas rlung
phyi la 'gro tshe bde dge kun
'od zer dkar po'i rnam pa yis
rlung dang 'grogs nas phyir song ba
ma rnams kun gyi sna bu gnas
zhugs pas ma rnams bde bas tshem
nang du 'jug tshe ma rnams kyi
sdig sgrib sdug bsngal ji snyed pa
thams cad 'od zer nag po yi
rnam pas ma yi sna bug nas
thon nas rang gis sna bug tu
zhugs te rang la smon par gyur
brgyad pa nyams len de dag dang
des mtshon kun byang chos kun kyang
ngo bos grub pa'i skye 'gag dang
rtag chad 'gro 'ong gcig tho dang
mtha' brgyad chos sam dngos po ru
'dzin pa'i rtog pa'i dri ma yis
ma spags mtha' bral dbu ma'i lam
rang bzhin med par mnyam par bzhag
de las langs pa'i rjes thob tu
chos kun rang bzhin med na yang
tha snyad tsam du sgyu ma ltar
snang zhing grub par shes pa yis
ngo bos grub pa'i rtag mtha' dang
gtan nas med pa'i chad mtha' ru
zhen pa'i 'ching ba las grol te
bla med byang chub myur thob shog
bla ma 'od dpag med mgon gyis
chos kun ngo bos stongs pa dang
tha snyad tsam du snang ba'i blo
zung 'brel skye bar byin gyis rlobs
spyi bo'i bla ma'i gnas gsum las
bdud rtsi 'od zer dpag med babs
lus bkrus nad gdon sdig sgrib dang
khyad par bdag 'dzin gces 'dzin sbyangs
lus gang tshe bsod yon tan dang
khyad par byang chub sems gnyis skyes
bla ma 'od dpag med mgon gyis
bdag gzhan 'gro ba ma lus pas
khyod kyi go 'phang dam pa de
myur du thob par byin gyis rlobs
de ltar gdung shugs drag po yis
gsol ba btab pas dgyes bzhin du
rang la thim pas sgrib gnyis dag
zung 'jug tshe dpag med du gyur
rang gi thugs ka'i hriH yig las
'od zer 'phros te 'gro kun gyi
sdig sgrib sbyangs shing tshogs rdzogs te
tshe dpag med ru gyur gzungs bzla
ma skyes pa rnams skyes gyur cig
skyes pa nyams pa med pa dang
gong nas gong du 'phel bar shog
rang rgyud smin byed phyin drug dang
gzhan rgyud smin byed bsdu bzhi sogs
rlabs chen tshogs gnyis rab rdzogs te
kun mkhyen go 'phang myur thob shog
sku la mtshan dpe'i dpal 'bar zhing
gsung dbyangs yan lag drug cus brgyan
thugs ni zab yangs mkhyen brtse'i gter
dpal ldan bla ma'i bkri shog
